pr_title: Print information about validators on startup

timeline.message:
Print information about validators on startup

 - moved loggingConfigurator to update first during BeaconNode startup, so that log messages can be used in services

 - centralised a function to shorten a BLSPublicKey

 - made it so that the EncryptedKEystoreWriter and ValidatorLoader align on their shortened string of a public key to make it easier to find things.

 Addresses #1762

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
